subject: Hockey, Ice
Traumatic Brain Injury
lead_paragraph: “We are moving toward a set of rules or a specific rule” to curb blind-side shoulder checks to the head, a member of a group that has been studying the matter said.
snippet: “We are moving toward a set of rules or a specific rule” to curb blind-side shoulder checks to the head, a member of a group that has been studying the matter said.
